Uses of Interface
javaslang.exception.Try

  • Packages that use Try 
    Package Description
    javaslang.exception
    Exception handling with the Try monad.
    javaslang.io
    The io package contains classes for performing IO operations.

    • Uses of Try in javaslang.io

      Methods in javaslang.io that return Try 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Try<byte[]> IO.loadResource(java.lang.String resource)
      Reads a system reosurce and returns the content as byte[].
      static Try<java.lang.String> IO.loadResource(java.lang.String resource, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Reads a system reosurce and returns the content as String using a specific Charset to encode the bytes.
      static Try<byte[]> IO.toBytes(java.io.InputStream in)
      Convert an InputStream to byte[].
      static Try<java.lang.String> IO.toString(java.io.InputStream in, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Convert an InputStream to String using a specific Charset to encode the bytes.
